In Covinsanity, we focus on the not-so-serious stories coming from the outbreak. We've gathered the funniest and strangest news from around the world that we guarantee will put a smile on your face.

Hang in there, we will get through this together! If the pandemic and COVID-19 have been stressful and you are looking for support, check out our Anxiety and Stress group on Tuesdays led by our CAPS Psychologists. Sign up here:
Our road back is just beginning, and we need your help. Please continue to social distance and wear a mask, until we're all protected and back to the way we remember.
